snippet: The film took in about $96.2 million at North American theaters over the weekend, a 48 percent increase over the three-day opening for its series predecessor in 2011.
abstract: The film took in about $96.2 million at North American theaters over the weekend, a 48 percent increase over the three-day opening for its series predecessor in 2011.

headline.main: 'Captain America: The Winter Soldier' Has a Huge Opening
